mema awasthawanta pranshaye pradhana adhikarana sanghanayaka pujya murungagasyaye nyanissara nahimiyan samaga bauddha ha pali wishwawidyalaye hitapu kulapathi pujya mahacharya iththademaliye indasara himi, madagama chandaloka himi, hitapu kathikacharya wirapana jinarathana himi, iththademaliye dhammasiri himi, nyanissara nahimi padaname lekam kirinde pemasiri himiyan saha kolambaa widyodaya piriwene aacharya mulane gunananda himiyan athulu maha sangharathnaya, shrimal fonseka, shrimathi fonseka, waidya dab.em.el.en.wijesinha, injineru ke.premakumara, dharma shri thilakawardhana, dab.ee.es. gunathilaka, ranawira wirakkodi yana mahathma mahathmin athulu pradeshawasi wishala pirisak sahabhagi wuha.

mahinda dan kala yuthu hondama de deshapalanayen samuganimaya.ese nathiwa karana hama dekinma ohu sawuththu wi ohuge prathirupayata hani siduwe.eelanga maha mahamathiwaranayedi shrilanipaya darunu lesa khadanaya we.widuli putu chanda, aadiya menma ayi ti en,jathika walin manasa sakas kala chandada idiriyedi natha.rajya balaya nathiwa shrilanipayata chandaya kirima tikak nuhuru wanu atha.pawena chandada yana kochchiyata naginnata hadanu atha.seratamath wada horakam eliwana wita thiyana chanda tikatath kelawenu atha.dina siya yatathe sahana dunnoth aanduwa janapriya wanu atha.me sahana dunne kalin aanduwe horakam nawathuna nisa kiya eeththu ganwuwoth shrilanipayata ambaa saranaya.
